column4: hi. i accidently set up two screensavers on my system by installing xscreensaver manually. does anyone know how to reset the mess to default?
i uninstalled xscreensaver the system->screensaver link disappeard but it still works
can i blacklist it somehow in the etc/ files?
so how do i remove it?
and you also have both kscreensaver and gnome-screensaver
they did, know i left the xscreensaver extras which gnome screensaver detects but only one is started/active now
neither synaptic manager nor the software center said xscreensaver is still installed
